text: Approximately half of Australians think the national budget deficit should be reduced, even if it means fewer public services.
Approximately half of Australians think that when there is an economic problem government spending usually makes it worse.
44% of Austrialins think the government should continue defence spending at the current level.
91% of Australians think federal government funding for universities should not be reduced.
54% of Australians think students in government and non-government schools should receive the same amount of federal funding.
34% of Australians think the federal government should not put a price on carbon.
15% of Australians think the federal government should do less to tackle climate change.
54% of Australians strongly think the government should further restrict foreign ownership of Australian agricultural land.
38% of Australians think that ive animal exports should not be banned.
82% of Australians think that Medicare should offer basic dental care for everyone, even if people have to pay a higher Medicare levy.
66% of Australians think private health insurance rebates should depend on income.
Australians are divided on how many new immigrants Australia should admit.
Australians are strongly divided whether boats carrying asylum seekers should be turned back.
39% of Australians think asylum seekers who arrive by boat should be allowed to settle in Australia.
51% of Australians think there should be more restrictions on 457 visas issued to temporary foreign workers.
46% of Australians strongly think the Australian constitution should recognise indigenous people as Australia's first inhabitants.
29% of Australians do not think trade unions have too much power in the workplace.
32% of Australians do not think Workplace protections have gone too far.
30% of Australians think the Commonwealth should pass laws requiring more women in senior positions.
55% of Australians think the National Broadband Network should deliver faster speeds even if it costs more.
17% of Australians think the Commonwealth should provide more financial support provide to the car industry.
57% of Australians think mining companies should pay more tax.
55% of Australians think there should not be fewer restrictions on coal seam gas exploration.
60% of Australians thikn the government's parental leave pay should be the same for all working mothers.
Australians are strongly divided on whether marriage should only be between a man and a woman.
47% of Australians think abortion services should be more accessible in Australia.
41% of Australians think the amount of government regulation on business should remain the same.
